text: Nikoly by lyudsʹkyy buduchy komu BOH NE BLAHOSLOVLYAYE z svyatym pysannyam ta prophethood skazhutʹ lyudyam, "Idolize meni bilya BOHA." Zamistʹ tsʹoho, (vin by skazav), "Prysvyachuyete sebe absolyutno do vashoho Lorda vyklyuchno," z·hidno z svyatym pysannyam vy propoviduyete ta vykladannya vy doviduyetesya
